items.sentence: Tom isn't the best player on our team, but he's pretty good.
Tom taught his children what they needed to know to survive.
Excuse me, would you show me how to use the washing machine?
If you don't want to get married, you shouldn't get married.
If you're finished reading that book, I'd like to borrow it.
It's just like sawing off the branch that you're sitting on.
I suspect Tom probably didn't do what he was supposed to do.
People who say that that's how it's always been irritate me.
What's the most difficult thing about learning how to drive?
When Tom loses his hair, which he will, he'll be OK with it.
